message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $16,000. I believe it will be very beneficial for you, and this is a very competitive price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand your product has value, but I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for it. Please consider this offer.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I can't go lower than $14,000. This product offers significant value, and I'm confident you'll see a return on that investment.
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I am willing to offer $12,500. This is my final offer.
